name: Astral Quester
description:
First of all！This is a Space Waifu game...
"Astral Quester" is a unique space strategy card game that seamlessly blends the uncertain thrill of a road trip adventure with the strategic planning of a card game. Step into the shoes of an interstellar explorer and embark on an awe-inspiring journey into the unknown cosmos with a captivating group of space companions.
The game features a card-based mechanism where each space companion, or "waifu," is a distinctive Star Maiden with unique skills and characteristics. Through recruiting, training, and assembling your card deck, you'll craft your own squadron of stellar ladies.
